data.title: Spotlight On on LinkedIn: Jesse Colin Young
data.meta_description: From the Spotlight On archive: Lawrence Peryer chats with American roots music legend Jesse Colin Young, known as the frontman for The Youngbloods (of…
data.text:
Exciting News! Check out the latest blog post on NME featuring an in-depth interview with Tim Burgess as he shares the "Soundtrack Of My Life." From his earliest musical memories to the songs that have shaped his career, this interview is a must-read for music enthusiasts. Click here to read the full article: https://ift.tt/DT3FJ8S

𝙏𝙤𝙣𝙞𝙜𝙝𝙩, 𝙢𝙖𝙠𝙚 𝙞𝙩 𝙢𝙖𝙜𝙣𝙞𝙛𝙞𝙘𝙚𝙣𝙩…. This week’s song is by the absolutely one of a kind and iconic, Blondie….their top selling single in the UK. 💡Factoid - the song was used in the film, ‘Trainspotting’, but that was a cover version by, ‘Sleepers.’ The simplicity of the lyrics absolutely allows the musicality to shine, the beat is truly infectious, and it will definitely raise your energy levels. This week’s business twist is much like the length of this post. The point here is it doesn’t have to be complicated and simple words can win the day. As an example, if you have 10 items and 1 important message, then maybe save the other 9 for another time, tone down the Daedalian words 🙂, and allow your key message to shine….starting from…. ……𝙩𝙤𝙣𝙞𝙜𝙝𝙩! #music #business #energy

On Substack, which I've used off-and-on for a couple years now, I take a break from the other things I talk about (business, communications, etc.) to discuss music. Specifically, some of the best songs of 2024 so far. Here's to Stephen Barrigar for serving as my musical muse the past few years. Link to the post in the comments.

Title: Top & the Best of the Best Tunes💐🌺💮|||| Timeless Tunes my all-time Favorite🎼🎵🎶|||| @costlyideas |||| Description: In this My Sixth You Tube Podcast, step into a world of musical nostalgia as I share the songs that have shaped my life's soundtrack. In 'Timeless Tunes,' I'll take you on a journey through the decades, unveiling the melodies that have held a special place in my heart. From the classics that transcended eras to contemporary gems that struck a chord, these tracks have been my constant companions. Discover the stories, emotions, and memories tied to each tune, and join me in celebrating the timeless magic of music. Get ready to groove, reminisce, and perhaps even find new favorites along the way.

I'm often asked how long it should take to finish a piece. Obviously there are a lot of variables involved. But there's one crucial factor you may be overlooking. I'll tell you what you need to know in this first video in my new series, Fast Track to the Finish. Video 2 in this Fast Track to the Finish series, "Do You Do Both Kinds of Practice?" will be coming your way next week. In the meantime, if you haven't registered for the new Intensive, Finish It: Get Your Music Out of Limbo and Into Your Fingers, just click the link below. JOIN THE INTENSIVE NOW: https://lnkd.in/e-DYBzrb #harp #harpist #harpintensive #harpmusic #harplessons #harppractice #harpmastery

Is musical talent something innate or nurtured through determination and dedication? I discussed this question with fellow music enthusiast and the founder of Elmore Pedal Company, James Levin We talked about the essence of musical prowess and whether it extends beyond a specific skill. Or does it come from an unwavering desire to create melodies that resonate? According to James, passion and persistence fuel this musical journey, enabling individuals to thrive, regardless of when they began their musical exploration. Follow along as I continue unraveling engaging topics and have insightful conversations with industry experts and enthusiasts. My goal is to spark thought-provoking discussions with my network of entrepreneurs and business experts. #MusicalCompetence #PassionForMusic

Curious about the beats that are setting the tone for the month? This article by Prof. Lalitha Suhasini, Faculty of Journalism, FLAME University, spotlights the musical brilliance of The Archies, Leo, and Animal, offering a behind-the-scenes look at the magic brewing in the world of music. It discusses the artists shaping the contemporary music scene and the stories behind the melodies that have us hooked. It also talks about the artists’ distinct styles and how they contribute to the rich tapestry of musical expression. Explore more by reading the entire article here: https://lnkd.in/d2HTSYek

🎵 Discover the captivating untold story of Beatlemania's American debut! Learn about the role of DJ Dick Biondi in introducing The Beatles to the US, and how a letter from a teenager ignited a musical revolution. Unearth the influence of George Martin, the 'Fifth Beatle', in shaping their iconic sound. This article is full of serendipity and cultural shifts, unveiling the fascinating journey behind The Beatles' rise to fame. Read more about this captivating piece of music history here: #Beatles #MusicHistory

What's your guilty pleasure outside the 9-to-5 grind?🎵 I'm a lawyer by day, reality TV binge-watcher by night 📺 And if there's live music? I'm there! From screamo to symphonies, it's all music to my ears 🎵🤘 What are your non-business passions? Drop them below! #FulljamesLaw #BeyondTheBriefcase #LegalInsights #EstatePlanningTips #CommercialLawMatters
